meta.videoTitle: How to Prevent & Treat Colds & Flu

proposition: Charting health trends and sickness can be a valuable tool in understanding and improving one's immune system and overall well-being.
The process involves monitoring various factors such as sleep quality, exercise intensity, travel, and exposure to different environments.
Individuals can gain insights into how their behaviors may impact their susceptibility to colds and flu by keeping track of these variables and analyzing patterns.

The author noted details such as workout intensity, quality of sleep, and exposure to cold temperatures.
The author was able to identify correlations between certain activities and the onset of cold or flu symptoms.
This self-tracking approach allowed the author to gradually reduce the frequency of illnesses over the years.
